casebody.data:
State of North Carolina
v.
Antorio Maurice Smarr No. 579P01-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 8, 2016. Ms. Kristin Jo Uicker, Assistant Attorney General, Mr. Locke Bell, District Attorney, For State of N.C. Mr. Antorio Rice Smarr, Pro Se.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 11th of October 2016 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Gaston County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 8th of December 2016."
